thread.title: Paula Giambrone-Kerr

author: Paula Giambrone-Kerr
title: Paula Giambrone-Kerr
text:
The very first time I ever ordered a photo on canvas - it was a disaster. (From another company)
Since then, I have switched to Canvasdiscount and have ordered at least 5 others that I have been thrilled with. The 6th order ... the most recent ... was to replace that first disaster! It's beautiful ... and I'm so happy it has finally been replaced!
